summary: Kaarim Miraaks brother all dlcs required
descriptionHtml:
He uses the konoharik mask you need the fallen paladins armor to make it look like in the picture above heres a link http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29082 can be crafted in the steel category need skyrim 1.8+ and SKSE also apachii hair heres a link http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
                                          HE HAS DONE THE TEMPLE OF MIRAAK
author: g33kox2
